name: Pew Pew Crew! (itch)
description:
Your crew is your currency. Decide carefully which crew members you want to “fire”.

WASD: Move
LEFT CLICK: Fire
MOUSE WHEEL or 1,2,3: Switch crew member
R: Restart Level

Game by: Yannick Pawils, Jonas Tyroller
Music by: IceGold
Big thanks to chat as well! :p
